participant_1.background:
I want to show my music to the world!
I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, but I'm ready for a change.
On the weekend, I might drum in a band or watch a movie about aliens invading the earth.
I love my quiet home in the suburbs, but I often go into the city for fun and excitement.
I'm going to make some blue clothes to wear when the weather is warmer.

participant_2.background:
I often visit museums to expand my knowledge of the world and to enjoy the works of art.
I grew up with my parents and siblings.
i also give blood monthly in honor of my sister who died.
I am a single, child-free professional who enjoys flying model airplanes and eating gummy bears.
I'm afraid of not being able to accomplish my dreams.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I enjoy visiting museums to expand my knowledge of the world and to enjoy the works of art.
I've always wanted to go to a museum, but I've never had the chance.
Oh, that's too bad! There are so many amazing museums out there.
I know, right? I've always wanted to go to the Louvre in Paris.
That's one of my favorite museums! I've been there twice, and I loved it both times.
I bet it was amazing! I've seen pictures of it, and it looks like a magical place.
It is! The architecture is incredible, and the art collection is mind-blowing.
I'm so jealous! I hope I can make it there one day.
I'm sure you will! You just have to make the time.
Thanks for the encouragement! I'm going to start saving up for my trip.
That's great! I'm sure you'll have a wonderful time.
